question: Prime Minister's Shram Award is given by __________.
explanation: The GOI announced the Prime Minister's Shram Awards for the year 2016. It will be awarded to the 50 workers.The award was given by Ministry of Labour and Employment every year. These awards are given to the workers in the Public Sector Undertakings, Departmental Undertakings of the Central and the State Governments and Private Sector units. Shram Awards are given in four categories namely 'Shram Ratna Award', 'Shram Bhushan Award'( Rs. 1,00,000 cash prize), 'Shram Vir/Shram Virangana' ( Rs. 60,000 cash prize)and 'Shram Shree/Shram Devi Awards' ( Rs. 40,000 cash prize).
